name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"27df1bb1-6536-42e1-8d2c-8cda01bf01c6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: _handle_function_def","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"924cb439-7dd4-4101-b9b2-56b3c866b7ad","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the shared "engine room" for processing all types of function definitions in Python, whether they are standard functions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), asynchronous functions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"async def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), or lambdas. Its primary responsibility is to analyze the function's interface: identifying its name, setting up its scope, processing its arguments (parameters), and determining default values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"be78a135-71c7-4afa-89b4-22dc2acd23cb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"A function definition is the contract between a caller and the code. To analyze code correctly, the tool must understand this contract precisely.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bca78dc9-5131-460a-b3ac-4a772734e5e8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Isolation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It ensures variables inside the function (like parameters) don't leak out to the global scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9a9b69df-ab0b-4e8f-96f6-41ad92940ef6","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" In classes, the first argument (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") is special—it points to the instance. This function detects that connection so that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is correctly linked to the class member ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bda2a740-55a4-49fc-873a-d4ae1cfd1fb8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Default Values:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If a function has defaults (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def log(msg, level="INFO")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), the analyzer needs to know that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"level","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" starts as a string, even if no one calls the function yet.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9910e8cc-6e55-4f6b-8491-aebd875baddc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e7e1489e-adc3-46cf-99d3-8af097e91d24","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope & Definition Setup:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"0dba64a3-1137-4503-b654-491bc8b95929","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates the formal Definition object for the function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4a35e76b-3099-49cf-b136-c9f4126c28fc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a dedicated Scope for the function body.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"01b0222c-c090-4d27-b62f-bc332452209e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a special ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<return>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" variable inside this scope to track what the function outputs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"a787e386-fddb-4e78-b912-1c740626bf68","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method vs. Function Detection:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"50a2d3ba-d708-4142-ae86-daf5118daa47","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks if the function is defined inside a Class (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8de92b99-7233-4060-bc3a-2a354d38f0be","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"@staticmethod","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b9c1c4e9-70e1-4369-b10e-1b7bdc023816","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If it's a regular instance method (inside a class, not static), it treats the first argument (conventionally ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") specially. It links ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the Class instance, enabling attribute lookup.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"ed8b4c2f-0176-41d5-92d3-f00e36122222","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Parameter Analysis:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"8336de9d-316c-4cb6-a41c-6dc7202577b8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It extracts all standard arguments (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and keyword-only arguments (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"kwonlyargs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6bce2e1c-36f3-44ee-b010-85fdbb9503ab","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a local Definition of type ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PARAM_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for each argument.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d85edafd-7c53-41ce-9421-12a8f1ca7119","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It registers these parameters in the function's scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"d436f382-8bd5-45df-8a4c-ac4c6a2a2cb7","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Default Value Handling:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"e1141d49-59de-489d-ad5e-5f698162b25b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_get_fun_defaults","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to analyze default values (e.g., resolving ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x=5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"73648314-5f8b-4912-aa7f-50305eeef58d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If a parameter has a default, it links the parameter's definition to that value immediately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"f4942357-c767-4fb5-ac2f-a021049e2bc4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Consider this method inside a class:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d7d0954d-56e7-4905-9435-12744b47fa13","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"class Logger:
    def log(self, message, severity="INFO"):
        pass","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"080afe9e-d12d-46a8-abef-b82ae62210e1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" processes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"log","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f4e99087-c5be-4c97-a896-44280b9d9ddb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It sees it is inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class Logger","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"24a5e880-04f2-400e-975c-ed47f8eb7277","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a scope for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"log","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8b5170a5-f038-4c69-b9e8-d2b23c2694f9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" handling:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It grabs the first argument, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It creates a definition ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Logger.log.self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and points it to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Logger","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Now, code using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" knows it refers to the class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8b6628c0-cf0a-484d-bf46-c718c57a5c64","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"message","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" handling:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It creates ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Logger.log.message","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as a generic parameter.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e2f5ea17-cabb-4d45-a2aa-3e41f88d018e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"severity","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" handling:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It creates ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Logger.log.severity","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It calculates the default value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""INFO"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (a string) and links ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"severity","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to it. The analyzer now knows ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"severity","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is likely a string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d64ba385-9a3d-4fad-a6f3-f0b5dfa31bec","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
